home.welcome_description: Protect your crops with AI-powered disease detection and expert agricultural advice
home.disease_detection_desc: Upload plant images for instant disease identification and treatment recommendations
home.expert_advice_desc: Get personalized farming advice from agricultural experts
home.farmer_contribution_desc: Share your knowledge and experiences with the farming community
home.buy_medicine_desc: Purchase recommended medicines and treatments for plant diseases
home.multi_language_desc: Access the platform in multiple languages for better understanding

diseaseDetection.title: Plant Disease Detection
diseaseDetection.dragDrop: Drag and drop an image here, or click to select

error.invalidResponse: Received invalid response from AI API

diseaseDetection.ai_status_failed: Failed to connect to AI API
diseaseDetection.ai_status_generic_error: An error occurred with the AI API
diseaseDetection.no_image_selected_or_ai_down: Please select an image or check the AI API status.
diseaseDetection.tip_clear_photos: Take clear, well-lit photos of the affected plant parts
diseaseDetection.tip_focus_diseased: Focus on the diseased area while including some healthy tissue
diseaseDetection.tip_not_blurry: Ensure the image is not blurry or too dark

error.invalidInput: Please fill in all required fields

farmerContribution.title: Farmer Contribution
farmerContribution.description: Share your knowledge and experiences with the farming community

about.title: About Farm Health
about.description: Empowering farmers with AI-driven plant disease detection and expert agricultural guidance to ensure healthy crops and sustainable farming practices.
about.mission_text: At Farm Health, we're dedicated to revolutionizing agricultural practices through cutting-edge technology. Our mission is to provide farmers with accurate, real-time plant disease detection and expert guidance to protect their crops and maximize yields.
about.mission_text_2: We combine advanced machine learning algorithms with agricultural expertise to create a comprehensive solution that helps farmers identify plant diseases early, receive expert recommendations, and maintain healthy crops throughout the growing season.
about.tensorflow_desc: Advanced machine learning framework for accurate plant disease detection and classification
about.react_desc: Modern frontend framework for building responsive and interactive user interfaces
about.flask_desc: Lightweight and flexible backend framework for robust API development
about.pathology_desc: Expert knowledge in plant diseases and agricultural best practices

buyMedicine.title: Farmacy: Your Crop Care Store
buyMedicine.description: Find and purchase effective solutions to protect your crops from diseases and pests.

footer.description: Empowering farmers with AI-powered plant disease detection and expert agricultural advice
footer.newsletter_desc: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates and farming tips
